product_name: Wigwam Ironman Triathlete Pro Low-Cut Socks - 2 Pairs
long_description: Ironman Triathlete Pro Low-Cut socks are made for performance. Thin and light, they provide serious athletes a comfortable, blister-free edge. Fabric repels moisture, prevents blisters and is lightweight. Nylon is a strong, versatile hard-wearing fiber; and the stretch makes them fit like a soft glove. Contains advanced moisture-absorbing acrylic fibers which contain micropores that have a capillary capacity to absorb moisture, and then dissipate it by evaporation. It's 1 of the only moisture-absorbing acrylic fibers on the market; although it is a lightweight fiber, it has superior insulative qualities and keeps odors at bay. Wigwam Ironman Tri socks have a seamless toe closure to prevent irritation. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. Please note: a package of 2 pairs counts as 1 pair of socks for the 10% volume discount.
short_description: Ironman Triathlete Pro Low-Cut socks are made for performance. Thin and light, they provide serious athletes a comfortable, blister-free edge.
